# Metadata 

```{r echo=FALSE} 
    
    dp <- params$dartParams
    kv <- c(dartVersion = '2.0', lat = dp$lat, lng = dp$lng, date = format(Sys.time(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'), 
                        targetRadius = dp$targetRadius,
                        searchRadius = dp$searchRadius,
                        buffer = dp$buffer,
                        nControl = dp$nControl,
                        synthControlStartYear = dp$synthControlStartYear)
    meta <- data.frame(id = names(kv), value = kv)
    row.names(meta) <- NULL
    knitr::kable(meta)
```
